statements: SELECT * FROM user_authentication;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM user_authentication ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE user_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, role FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE 'J%' AND role = 'user';
SELECT username, payment_data FROM user_authentication WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT username, password_hash, payment_data FROM user_authentication WHERE username LIKE '%son' AND role = 'user';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM payment_data WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM payment_data ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT payment_id, user_id, payment_amount FROM payment_data ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT users.username, payment_data.payment_amount FROM users JOIN payment_data ON users.user_id = payment_data.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT permission_name, description FROM permissions;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT p.permission_name, p.description, u.username FROM permissions p JOIN users u ON p.permission_id = u.user_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM users u JOIN payments p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT u.username, p.amount FROM users u LEFT JOIN payments p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles ORDER BY role_name ASC;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id INNER JOIN roles r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'a%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE description IS NOT NULL;

SELECT u.username, r.role_name, p.permission_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id JOIN permissions p ON r.role_id = p.permission_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT user_id, username, action, log_timestamp FROM users JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id WHERE action = 'login';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, email, created_at FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_name = 'Admin';
SELECT u.username, p.amount, p.payment_date FROM users u JOIN payments p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE p.amount > 1000 ORDER BY p.payment_date ASC;
SELECT u.username, a.action, a.log_timestamp FROM users u JOIN access_logs a ON u.user_id = a.user_id WHERE a.action = 'Login' ORDER BY a.log_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
